elements.name: A california user is charged tax when checking out

steps.name: a registered user with a California Address
the user logs in
the user selects the Loot Crate crate
the user selects a one month subscription plan
the user submits valid subscription information
the user is displayed the correct tax
the recurly account's last transaction should have tax calculated

elements.name: Change from US to International Country and verify pricing.

steps.name: an unregistered user
the user visits the signup page
the user submits valid signup information
the user visits the lootcrate_subscribe page
the user sets their country to Poland
the Poland price for all plans should be displayed

elements.name: Change from US to International Country and verify pricing.

steps.name: an unregistered user
the user visits the signup page
the user submits valid signup information
the user visits the lootcrate_subscribe page
the user sets their country to Portugal
the Portugal price for all plans should be displayed

elements.name: Change from US to International Country and verify pricing.

steps.name: an unregistered user
the user visits the signup page
the user submits valid signup information
the user visits the lootcrate_subscribe page
the user sets their country to Singapore
the Singapore price for all plans should be displayed

elements.name: Israel user signs up for random month subscription

steps.name: a registered user with a Israel address
the user logs in
the user selects the Loot Crate crate
the user sets their country to Israel
the user selects a random month subscription plan
the user submits valid subscription information
the new subscription should be added to the user account
recurly should have a matching international subscription
the recurly billing address should have no state
the user should receive a subscription confirmation email

elements.name: User can reset password via the forgot password link

steps.name: an registered user with no prior subscription
the user logs in
the user logs out
the user resets their password through the modal
The user clicks on the reset link in their email
the user enters a new password
the user should be able to login with their new password
